description: An everyday jacket that’s protective and looks the part, this 3-in-1 system pairs a waterproof-breathable twill shell with a warm liner. The shell works hard to block out the elements, while the liner maintains heat with down-like insulation and an Omni-Heat™ Infinity advanced thermal-reflective interior. Wear them together or on their own.
name: Columbia Sportswear Stuart Island Interchange Jacket - Mens
